content.question: Which of the following claims about Ronald Reaganâ€™s victory in 1980 is supported by the arguments in the two excerpts?

choices.label: It resulted from concerns about recent changes in gender and race relations.
It resulted in a redistribution of income benefiting the wealthy.
It reflected voter dissatisfaction with government regulation of industry.
It resulted from shifts in Democratic and Republican voter coalitions.

content.answer: It resulted from shifts in Democratic and Republican voter coalitions.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
